profile.name: Nikhil Chitrapu
profile.title: Project Manager | Certified Scrum Master | PRINCE2® Specialist | AI Generalist
profile.summary: Certified Scrum Master & PRINCE2® Project Management Professional with 9+ years of international experience in engineering, plant construction, and project management. Graduate of the McKinsey Forward Program with training in structured problem-solving, critical thinking, and digital collaboration. Expert in milestone and budget control, reporting, process optimization, cross-functional collaboration, and stakeholder management; AI Generalist with a strong focus on agile methodologies.

details: Managed end-to-end campaigns for 45+ EMEA clients with an average 22% ROI increase.
Mentored and trained 12 colleagues, boosting team performance by 25%.
Handled 180+ escalations with 90%+ customer satisfaction.
Supported the transition from SBG to GBG within six months.

experience.company: MS Agarwal Foundries Pvt. Ltd., Hyderabad
details: Installed and commissioned mechanical systems in three steel plants (€50M).
Led the Thermex Quenching System project, increasing quality by 18% and reducing scrap by 12%.
Coordinated 25+ cross-functional teams, reducing project delays by 35%.
Investigated and resolved failed shipments; performed 95+ quality checks daily.
Successfully reintegrated 1,900+ items per month.
Participated in four Kaizen initiatives, increasing shipping accuracy by 11%.
Developed 185+ CAD fixtures and 280+ drawings, reducing production time by 23%.
Optimized manufacturing processes for 14 cylinder block variants.
Contributed to 7 R&D projects; 3 products successfully launched.
Performed 140+ thermal analyses, improving heat resistance by 28%.
Developed and tested 23 prototypes with over 90% success rate.
